name: Spicy Bacon-Wrapped Water Chestnuts II
author: CANDLELADY
summary: A tangy version of bacon wrapped chestnuts.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Cut each strip of bacon in half
Wrap one strip around one water chestnut
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 20 minutes
While the wraps are baking, in a small mixing bowl combine brown sugar, mayonnaise, and chili sauce  to make barbecue sauce
After the wraps have finished baking, transfer them (removing them from the grease) to a second shallow baking dish
Pour the sauce over the wraps
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 10 to 15 additional minutes, or until bacon is crispy
Serve hot out of dish with toothpicks
